trans-unit.source: Provides support for the behavior that enables Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
trans-unit.target: 提供行為的支援，該行為可讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 端點從瀏覽器型 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端接收 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: When applied to an endpoint, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> behavior enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding.
trans-unit.target: 當套用至端點時，除了 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 編碼所需要的支援，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> 行為也會啟用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 和 ASP.NET AJAX 整合。

trans-unit.source: Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> or by an appropriately configured <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 各種不同類型的編碼 (包括 JSON) 都是由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> 或由適當設定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 啟用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> behavior implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> and inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, which enables the more general Web programming model for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services exposing non-SOAP endpoints.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> 行為會實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> 並繼承自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>，為公開非 SOAP 端點的 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務啟用更一般性的 Web 程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>:
trans-unit.target: 具體地說，就是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>：

trans-unit.source: Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 HTTP 程式設計模型，包括根據 URL 後置字元發送至作業、HTTP 動詞命令選擇 (POST 或 GET) 支援和 HTTP 快取期間控制。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] HTTP 程式設計模型，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 程式設計模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，當使用這個行為時的預設 HTTP 動詞命令為 POST。

trans-unit.source: Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: 啟用各個作業之要求和回應訊息的正確格式器，例如，URL 參數的支援。

trans-unit.source: Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 JavaScript Proxy 端點。

trans-unit.source: To call a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> must be added to the endpoint behavior collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果要從 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端呼叫 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務，此服務必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 繫結來設定，而 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> 必須新增至端點行為集合。

trans-unit.source: This can be done either in configuration by adding the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive in the .svc file.
trans-unit.target: 作法是在組態加入<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>或不使用組態所啟動的 AJAX 端點<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>而不是中的預設處理站[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) .svc 指示詞檔案。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] different ways to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 若要啟用不同的方式[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]服務回應 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端，請參閱[建立 ASP.NET AJAX 的 WCF 服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest> value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest> value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公開合約的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime" /> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂行為的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 將行為套用至端點上的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> 方法，以在搭配端點的所有訊息上或針對特定作業檢視、修改或將自訂延伸加入至用戶端執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公開合約的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher" /> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂行為的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 將此行為套用至服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method is called by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會在此行為套用至端點時自動呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: So there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: 因此這個方法並不需要手動呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷是否啟用自動格式選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if automatic format selection is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用自動格式選取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] automatic format selection, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-formatting.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 自動格式選取範圍，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 格式化](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-formatting.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設的訊息本文樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This default value is the only valid value.
trans-unit.target: 這個預設值是唯一有效的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest> value is the only <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> supported and setting any other value results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.WrappedRequest> 值是唯一受支援的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>，而設定任何其他值會造成擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The body style set is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援本文樣式集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing request message format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設的傳出要求訊息格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> used by outgoing request messages.
trans-unit.target: 傳出要求訊息所使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Json" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Json" />。

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 訊息格式集不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response message format.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定預設的傳出回應訊息格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> used by outgoing response messages.
trans-unit.target: 傳出回應訊息所使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Json" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat.Json" />。

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 訊息格式集不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定內部伺服器錯誤 (HTTP 狀態碼：500) 發生時，是否產生 FaultException。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用旗標，會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷是否已啟用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST 說明頁面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST 說明頁面，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST 說明頁面，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 服務說明的網頁](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公開合約的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 確認端點符合允許它當做 ASP.NET AJAX 端點運作的需求。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> of the binding is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, and that the binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> where <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 確認端點不是 `null`、使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 配置、未使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>、使用 HTTP GET 或 POST 動詞命令、繫結的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 已設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>，而且該繫結包含其中 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> 的 `true`。

trans-unit.source: This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會檢查方法上沒有 SOAP 標頭或包裝函式名稱，或其他不支援的作業部分。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 端點不符合做為 ASP.NET AJAX 端點的其中一項需求。
